entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 09:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
